page.title: 01ABBERLEY VILLAGE 1985.
page.content: { Abberley}is in the county of Hereford{and Worcester,}situated six miles S.W.of Stourport on Severn and west of the River Severn.It is a small spread village nestling around the west side of{Abberley Hills,which rise {between 900 and 1000 feet above sea {level.} From the village you have a marvellous panoramic view of rolling hills.This open Country_side spreads from west to east,through north. The village is really split into two parts with the village school at the centre.{The Common}is the newer built up area. Many of the houses are between 15 and 20 years old.The older houses are in the area around the{old {church}(St. Michael's) and the{village {square.}The Council estate built in the 1940's is near St.MAry's Church. { }
